transcript.text: renowned linguist Dr Noam Chomsky among
others is warning of the dangers of chat
gbt launched last November chat GPT is
an artificial intelligence chatbot
developed by open AI
in a New York Times op-ed published on
Wednesday Chomsky and Professor Ian
Roberts along with Jeffrey radimal said
AI systems like chat GPT are incapable
of independent thought and are not like
the human mind the three wrote together
that cha gpt's responses exhibit
something like the banality of evil
plagiarism and apathy and obviation
they added that such programs are stuck
in a pre-human or non-human phase of
cognitive evolution
the human mind they said is a
surprisingly efficient and even elegant
system that operates with small amounts
of information
